nodes.text: Trell'yar was a male Bothan, who served the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

Trell'yar served the Rebel Alliance as a spy and was among a group of Bothan spies who helped to discover the location of the second Death Star. By 7 ABY, evidence had emerged that Trell'yar was an agent of the Galactic Empire, so the New Republic placed a bounty on his head. General Airen Cracken found the charges against Trell'yar hard to believe and Councilor Borsk Fey'lya openly stated that be believed that the charges were false.
